definition: to urge sb to drink alcohol
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe

sentences.english: Which in the eyes of Westerners, is very puzzling, why must urging people to drink?
sentences.chinese: 這在西方人的眼中是非常不解的，爲什麼一定要勸酒？

sentences.english: Do no inflict your favorite drinks on me.
sentences.chinese: 別勸酒，不要以爲你喜歡喝我就喜歡喝。
